title: mediawiki/api/request
description: A single request to the MediaWiki Action API (api.php)

$schema.description: A URI identifying the JSONSchema for this event. This should match an schema's $id in a schema repository. E.g. /schema/title/1.0.0

uri.description: Unique URI identifying the event or entity

request_id.description: Unique ID of the request that caused the event

dt.description: UTC event datetime, in ISO-8601 format

domain.description: Domain the event or entity pertains to

stream.description: Name of the stream/queue/dataset that this event belongs in

http.description: Information about the HTTP request that generated this event.

method.description: The HTTP request method (GET, POST, etc.)

request_headers.description: Request headers sent by the client.

database.description: The name of the wiki database this event belongs to.

backend_time_ms.description: Elapsed milliseconds to process request as measured by MediaWiki

api_error_codes.description: List of error codes for any errors encountered, e.g. 'apierror-missingparam' If this field is missing or empty, no errors were encountered.

params.description: Request parameters. These might come from http query string, or from the POST body. Sensitive params are redacted.
